string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "His grandma was a great piano player."
"His most embarrassing moment is when he broke his foot on stage during a song (he stayed and finished the song, didn't even miss a note!)"
"His shoe size is 7 and a half."
"His favorite colors are blue and purple."
"Justin Bieber's full name is Justin Drew Bieber."
"His two best friends are Ryan Butler and Chaz Somers."
"He has a half sister named Jazmine & brother Jaxon."
"He can play trumpet, guitar, piano and drums."
"His first kiss was when he was 13."
"He once dated Caitlin Beadles (Christians Beadles sister) ."
"He raised 150,000 lbs of food for food Bank, with the help of his fans."
"He is claustrophobic - fear of being in narrow or enclosed spaces (eg. elevators, closet)."
"His favorite music are R&B and Pop."
"His favorite music artists are: Usher, Michael Jackson, BoysIImen, Stevie Wonder."
"His nicknames are: J-Beebs, Justin, JB, Biebs, Beebs."
"He is very protective for his little sister."
"He likes sporty, active, nice, and down to earth girls."
"He likes to skateboard and is very good at it."
"His dad plays guitar, and his mom sings."
"He is signed by Usher. Justin Timberlake was reportedly in the running to sign Bieber."
"He got his first plaque at YTV's The Next Star at Canadas wonderland."
"He would date anyone he falls in love with."
"He wanted to buy a house for his mom when he has $1,000,000."
"He once asked out Rihanna and Alexa Chung (got rejected)."
